name: Decorative Item Sillage
description: This large tray with smooth lines unites the silky whiteness of enameled porcelain with solid tinted oak. It is used mainly as a table centerpiece and adds a discrete touch of sophistication. Between the modernity of design and traditional know-how (the enameled porcelain tray is produced by one of the oldest French porcelain manufacturers), the Sillage reveals all the beauty of the arts and crafts.
